description: The classic Ferrosi bottoms were improved for Spring 2022 with new designs and more functional features that make them better than ever for climbing and multi-sport. Plus, an updated eco-friendly fabric that is 45% recycled nylon with improved stretch and recovery for multi-day use.
name: Outdoor Research Ferrosi Shorts, 7" Inseam - Mens

specs.value: bluesign® approved 48% Recycled Nylon, 38% Nylon, 14% Spandex
